mapper.select: select o.state_title, o.no, o.cart_no,o.qty,o.date1,o.item_no,o.member_email, o.sales,o.sales_price, o.price, o.name,o.content from p1_member m inner join (select o.state_title, o.no, o.cart_no,o.qty,o.date1,o.item_no,o.member_email, m.sales,m.sales_price, m.price, m.name,m.content from p1_market m inner join (select o.state_title, o.no, o.cart_no,o.qty,o.date1,c.item_no,c.member_email from p1_cart c inner join (select o.state, s.title as state_title, o.no, o.cart_no,o.qty,o.date1 from p1_order_state s inner join p1_order o on o.state = s.code) o on c.no = o.cart_no) o on m.no = o.item_no) o on m.email = o.member_email where m.email = 'custom' order by o.no desc
